蝳字的基本解释

蝳
dài
〔蝳蝐（
m刼 ）〕同“玳瑁”，一种爬行动物，像龟。

蝳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dài］
［《廣韻》徒耐切，去代，定。］
见“蝳蝐”。

蝳字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蝳； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1091第14
【集韻】【韻會】?徒沃切，音毒。蝳蜍，今之蜘蛛。【爾雅疏】《方言》云：鼄蝥，北燕、朝鮮洌水之閒謂之蝳蜍。　又待戴切。與瑇同。詳玉部。

蝳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蝳字的起名意思

暂无。

Bug
Basic explanation of words
Bug
dài
〔蝝蝐(
m刼)] Same as "hawksbill", a reptile, like a tortoise.
Bug
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dài］
["Guangyun" is only patiently cut, go to generation, set. ]
See "bugs".
Bug
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蝳; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1091 Page 14
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Du Woqie, sound poison. Bufo, the spider of today. [Eryashu] "Dialect" says: 輄蝥, Beiyan, North Korea, North Korea, Lishuizhi Xian is called bufo.　Waiting to wear and cut again. Same as 瑇. Details of the Yu Department.
